title: I Am The Omnipotent Prince Charming - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Cheats   Game Elements   Jack of All Trades   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Sorrow Of A Stray Dog   流浪狗的悲哀
description: I am a high achiever, also a super athlete. I am a game guru, also kungfu master. Cooking, medicine, music, dance… there is nothing I can’t do. Undoubtedly even though I could have eked out a living with my face, I try to rely on my talent instead. I am Su Chen, I am a perfect prince charming.>
